chapters.title: Chapter 6: Threads Woven of Shadow
chapters.info: Lord Rodel Ituralde, p. 138 (183)—The commander of Arad Doman's army. He is one of the six best military commanders west of the Aiel Waste, in a league with Pedron Niall, Gareth Bryne, Davram Bashere, Agelmar Jagad, and Matrim Cauthon.
